name: FN Scout
description:
FN Scout provides all of the essential Fortnite Battle Royale stats right on your mobile phone!

Beyond just numbers, Fortnite Scout includes informative graphs that allow you to visually track your performance and improvement. Have you ever forgotten your kill count from last match? It even includes a match history report!

Features Include:
Overall stats including: kill/death ratio, wins, win rate, game mode breakdown, and more.
Match placement performance: visualize your placements.
Match history: see your performance over the last 10 matches.
Improvement charts: check back every Sunday to see your weekly improvement.
Comparison charts: see how you rank up against the competition.
Game mode breakdown: see how you performed in a single game mode (solo, duo, squads).
Supports PC, PS4, and Xbox One.

Console users: having trouble finding your username? See our helpful FAQ page:
PS4 Users: https://dev.fortnitescout.com/link-psn-account-to-epic-account
Xbox One Users: https://dev.fortnitescout.com/link-xbox-live-account-to-epic-account
